data_description.show_sidebar_panel: Show the Fado UI as a sidebar panel visible to all users. Disable this if you prefer to use a Lovelace dashboard with the custom:fado-card instead.
data_description.notifications_enabled: Show persistent notifications when unconfigured lights are detected.
data_description.dashboard_url: URL path for your custom Fado dashboard (e.g. /lovelace-fado/0). Used in notification links when the sidebar panel is disabled. Leave blank to omit the link.

user.title: Set up Fado
user.description: This integration provides smooth light fading for brightness and colors with automatic brightness restoration.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

fade_lights.name: Fade lights
fade_lights.description: Fades lights to a desired brightness and/or color over a specified transition period.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Target brightness level as a percentage (0-100).

transition.name: Transition time
transition.description: Transition time for fading in seconds. Accepts decimal values, e.g., 0.5 for 500ms (default 3).

rgb_color.name: Color
rgb_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue] values (0-255 each).

rgbw_color.name: RGBW color
rgbw_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue, white] values (0-255 each).

rgbww_color.name: RGBWW color
rgbww_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue, cold_white, warm_white] values (0-255 each).

xy_color.name: XY color
xy_color.description: Target color as CIE xy coordinates [x, y] (0-1 each).

easing.name: Easing curve
easing.description: Controls how brightness changes over time. 'auto' selects based on fade direction: ease_in (slow start) for fading up, ease_out (slow end) for fading down.

from.name: Starting values
from.description: Override starting values instead of using current state.

advanced_fields.name: Advanced options
advanced_fields.description: Additional options for advanced use cases.

exclude_lights.name: Exclude lights
exclude_lights.description: Excludes lights from Fado. Excluded lights are ignored by fade operations and state tracking.

include_lights.name: Include lights
include_lights.description: Re-includes previously excluded lights so they respond to fade operations again.
